task_summary: The robot pours contents from a cup into a mug using a sequential behavior tree: perceive, approach, pour, and retreat. The action is grounded in the episode imagery.

task_long_description.overview: This task involves a robot arm using a gripper to pour the contents of a cup into a mug positioned on a tabletop. The robot must identify the mug, move the cup above its mouth, pour efficiently with a 90-degree tilt, and retreat upon completion. Key objects are a cup (as source), a mug (as target), and the robot arm. The system is expected to handle perception and trajectory control, maintaining correct orientation and avoiding spillage.
preconditions: Source cup contains liquid or pourable material
Mug is placed on a stable horizontal surface and visible to the robot arm
stepwise_plan: Verify or detect the mug in the workspace
Move cup to a position above the mug
Tilt and pour the contents into the mug
success_criteria: Liquid or material is transferred from cup to mug
failure_and_recovery: If mug not immediately visible, retry detection
If movement above mug fails, raise and reposition
If pour not completed, timeout and halt for manual review
task_long_description.termination: Sequence ends once retreat is complete after pouring; safety stop on irrecoverable error.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the mug is visible before proceeding.
Detects the mug if it is not already visible.
Moves the cup to a position above the mug, preparing for pouring.
Executes the pouring action, tipping the cup over the mug.
Moves the arm away from the mug once pouring is complete.

recovery_strategy: Abort pour if alignment fails and alert operator
Timeout and retreat if pour fails
assumptions: The cup is already grasped by the robot at episode start.
Instruction did not specify the exact source object, but frames [0-8] confirm a cup is held.
The mug is the stationary target for pouring, consistently located in all frames.

expected_success_criteria: Liquid transfer observed from cup to mug with no spillage.
Robot arm safely retreats after pouring.
